allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement MIDI library manager with upload, conversion, and preview

- Add Next.js application with App Router
- Implement MIDI upload and MuseScore conversion pipeline  
- Create library management with search and preview
- Add PDF preview with full-screen mode
- Set up local file storage with metadata
- Update documentation and configuration

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update Claude Code settings

- Add git commit command to allowed list

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Preview: make MIDI player functional and restore full-screen" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Set midi-player src to piece MID so it''s playable immediately
- Restore original PDF full-screen button in preview page
- Load html-midi-player scripts via next/script in layout
- Include public/midi-visualizer-test.html for e2e verification

## Test plan
- Open /preview/[id] for a piece
  - MIDI player shows controls and can play immediately
  - Click Full Screen to open modal and verify PDF still works
- Visit /midi-visualizer-test.html
  - Verify local MIDI loads and plays via API

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
